response.overview: When a strange signal pulsates through all cell phone networks worldwide, it starts a murderous epidemic of epic proportions when users become bloodthirsty creatures, and a group of people in New England are among the survivors to deal with the ensuing chaos after.
response.tagline: When everyone is connected no one is safe.
response.title: Cell

titles.title: El pulso: La llamada del apocalipsis
Puls - Wenn alle vernetzt sind, ist keiner sicher

cast.name: Elizabeth Davidovich
cast.character: Airport Phoner / Tavern Phoner / Chaos Phoner
